Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Egyptian Ambassador to DPRK 
   Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein, newly-appointed Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on Yang at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Romanian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Romanian Party Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a conversation with the delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania led by Vasile Orleanu, chairman of its Supreme Council, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
